WHO_WE_ARE_CONTENT: Founded in 1987 in Saint-Quentin, in response to the local industrial crisis, 'Au temps donné' has continuously offered its help to those in need. Initially focused on food distribution and urban marauding, we have gradually expanded our range of services over time: from administrative to shuttles for remote appointments, literacy courses to tutoring, as well as fundraising events and activities for the elderly. Our commitment to the community remains our priority.
FIND_US_CONTENT: The historic location of the association was created in Saint-Quentin, at 6 Boulevard Gambetta... Over the years, the association has acquired a warehouse and several annexes. Whether you want to engage as a volunteer or benefit from our services, discover our different sites a difference in the lives of others.
HOW_TO_HELP_CONTENT: You can help us in different ways: by donating, becoming a volunteer, participating in our fundraising events, or sharing our cause on social media. Every gesture counts, and we are grateful for it.
FORM_INTRO_VOLUNTEER:
Volunteering, like solidarity, can take various forms!
This form will help our team of volunteers to offer you missions made for you.
FORM_INTRO_BENEFICIARY:
At “Au temps donne”, we are convinced of the diversity of expressions of solidarity.
          By completing this form, you allow us to identify your specific needs,
          which will help us to offer you missions adapted to your abilities and aspirations.
FORM_INTRO_DONATION: Change lives with “Au Temps Donné”! Every donation counts to support those in need. Contribute to this mission of solidarity and hope. Your contribution is our strength. Let's act now, for a more just and united world!
NAME: Name
LANGUAGES_EXPLAINATION: Select all the languages you can speak fluently. This will help us assign you more relevant assignments (especially for adult and child literacy classes)
LANGUAGES_EXPLAINATION_BENEFICIARY: Select all languages you can speak fluently. This will help us assign you volunteers best suited to your needs.
SEND_LICENSE: Please send a scanned copy of your driving license in pdf format
SEND_RESUME: Please send your resume in pdf format
PER_WEEK_VOLUNTEER_MISSIONS: per week for volunteer missions, on

WISH_MAIL_NEWS: I wish to be contacted about the association news by mail
DEMANDS_CHECKED: Demands will be carefully examined by our team, who reserves the right to accept or refuse a request based on the needs of the association and the availability of volunteers.
